title: 804. Derek Carr's Contract Extension, Big WR Contracts & Sneaky QB Teams
itunes:title: 804. Derek Carr's Contract Extension, Big WR Contracts & Sneaky QB Teams
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode of Move the Sticks. To start off, the guys react to the news of Raiders quarterback Derek Carr's contract extension. Then, the pair look at recent big contract extensions for wide receivers and compare them to the value of rookie contracts of players drafted in the first round. To wrap up the show, the duo give sneaky teams that could take a quarterback in the first round.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
